content: this wide brim crochet straw hat is a must have stylish functional and travel-friendly accessory the wire-edged brim will give more stability and you can easily bent the brim to shape it whatever you like you will need one roll of raffia paper craft ribbon packing paper twine 1/4 inch by 218 yards 200 meters + a just a bit from another roll for the braided band **update** april 2013 now is a available the matching **raffie crossbody bag** 1 **don t miss a thing ** subscribe to my free newsletter 2 to stay updated with new free crochet patterns tutorials and other yarnie things follow me on instagram 3 follow my fb page myhobbyiscrochet 4 for daily free crochet pattern links share your projects and get advice in our facebook group my hobby is crochet 5 get more crochet inspiration in my pinterest boards 6 check out my youtube channel 7 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/raffie-crossbody-bag 2 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n1x3g9 3 https //www instagram com/myhobbyiscrochet/ hl=de 4 https //www facebook com/myhobbyiscrochet ref=hl 5 https //www facebook com/groups/myhobbyiscrochet/ 6 https //www pinterest de/myhobbyiscroche/ 7 https //www youtube com/c/myhobbyiscrochetblog
